name: darkest-lariat
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user swings both arms and hits the target.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.
